newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy offers bonds, certificates for auction.
newsitem.headline: Italy offers bonds, certificates for auction.

text.p: The Italian Treasury said it will issue three, five, and 10-year fixed rate bonds (BTP) and seven year floating rate certificates (CCT) at its regular mid-month auction.
The Treasury said in a statement said it would offer:
* 1st tranche 15/5/97 3-yr BTPs paying a 6.0 percent coupon (unchanged from the previous 3-year BTP coupon).
* 15th tranche 1/2/97 10-yr BTP paying a 6.75 percent coupon.
* 3rd tranche 1/5/97 7-yr CCTs paying an initial 3.45 percent coupon.
The amount of paper offered will be announced on May 12.
Subscriptions for the CCT and 10-year BTP auctions close at 1100 GMT May 15.
Subscriptions for the three and five year BTP auctions close at 1100 GMT May 16. -- Rome newsroom +396 6782501
